text:
Another Monday, another #OnGuard! In our 'A letter from...' this week, Thalia Kehoe Rowden reports how HRMI is measuring human rights across the globe. @rightsmetrics

Also in this issue: housing, LGBT rights, youth concerns and the #COVID19 #vaccine.
